\subsection{Detailed Description}
It supports both linear and two-\/dimensional access (i.\+e., M-\/$>$data\mbox{[}p\mbox{]} or M-\/$>$array\mbox{[}i\mbox{]}\mbox{[}j\mbox{]} for an entry (i,j) at address p=j+i$\ast$ncols).
